name: Phalanx_Fighting
display_help: Your coordination with other shield users grants you all enhanced protection.
display_attacker_hit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

name: Energized_Shield
display_help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)

name: Push_Back
display_help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

name: Slice
display_help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

name: Hack
display_help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

name: Pilum

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

name: Shout_of_Command
display_help: By bouncing a carefully pitched sound wave off an ally's ear drum, you can free him from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, or Immobilize effects, and leave him resistant to such effects for a good while. Protection will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Clarity also provides your ally enhanced perception. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Terrorize, Confusion), +Perception
display_target_help: The soothing waves of sound clear your mind of all Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power, and improve his Perception.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.

name: Jab
display_help: You have been Disoriented.
display_target_help: You have been Disoriented.

display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.
display_target_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

name: Hurl

display_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation
display_target_help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
display_target_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

display_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.
display_target_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

name: Unyielding
display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF
display_target_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
display_target_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF

name: Knockout_Blow
display_help: The Hero has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.
display_target_help: The Hero has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
display_target_help: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.

name: Unstoppable
display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
display_target_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
display_target_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

messages.display_victim_hit: Your {PowerName} power has left you exhausted.

name: Death_Throw
display_help: Activating this power channels the power of the Netherworld to weaken your foes, in an attempt to revive all nearby fallen allies. You must stand near your defeated allies to revive them, then select a foe. The selected foe and all nearby foes will be Slowed, Disoriented, and drained of some life. Revived allies will have full Hit Points and Endurance and will suffer no ill effects and is left protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Ranged (AoE), Minor DMG(Negative), Target Slow, -Recharge, Disorient, Ally Rez
display_target_help: You have been Disoriented. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Howling Twilight.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

name: Slice
display_help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

name: Whirling_Sword
display_help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

name: Hack
display_help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

name: Pilum
display_help: You throw a pilum at a foe, dealing heavy damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

name: Shout_of_Command
display_help: By bouncing a carefully pitched sound wave off an ally's ear drum, you can free him from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, or Immobilize effects, and leave him resistant to such effects for a good while. Protection will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Clarity also provides your ally enhanced perception. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Terrorize, Confusion), +Perception
display_target_help: The soothing waves of sound clear your mind of all Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power, and improve his Perception.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.

name: Energized_Shield
display_help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)
display_attacker_hit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

name: Phalanx_Fighting
display_help: Your body resonates a mild Dampening Field that absorbs kinetic energy from physical weapons. This auto power permanently reduces all incoming Smashing and Lethal damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

name: Push_Back
display_help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Ebon_Eye
display_help: You can emit a beam of dark energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Negative Energy damage. Ebon Eye can also slow your target's attack rate and movement speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: Your attack rate and Running speed have been reduced by the Ebon Eye.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

name: Sunless_Mire
display_help: Sunless Mire can drain the essence of all nearby foes, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
display_target_help: Your attack rate and Running speed have been reduced by the Sunless Mire.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

name: Dark_Matter_Detonation
display_help: You hurl a blast of Dark Matter that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. All affected targets' have their attack rate and movement speed slowed. Some foes may be knocked down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD
display_target_help: Your attack rate and Running speed have been reduced by the Dark Matter Detonation.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

name: Essence_Drain
display_help: You tap the primal forces of your Nictus power to create an Essence Draining conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to you. Foes drained in this manner have their attack rate and movement speed reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your attack rate and Running speed have been reduced by the Essence Drain.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You gain {Damage} hit points from your {PowerName}!

name: Gravitic_Emanation
display_help: Gravitic Emanation sends bolts of dark Nictus energy to multiple targets within a cone area in front of the caster. Gravitic Emanation deals only minor Negative Energy damage to each affected foe, but knocks them back, leaving them Disoriented and with reduced attack rate and movement speed. Damage: Minor. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DMG(Negative), Foe Disorient, Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD
display_target_help: You have been Disoriented by the Gravitic Emanation. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced as well.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Protection will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Clarity also provides your ally enhanced perception. Recharge: Fast

name: Healing_Aura
display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.

name: Heal_Other
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.

display_help: The Surgeon can resurrect a fallen comrade.
